title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The night before the battle a skirmish took place between Kandolph Earl of Moray, and a party of English commanded bv Sir Kobcrt Clifford, at the north end of tlie village of Newhouse, about a quarter of a mile from Stirling.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Newhouse, on the way, was the spot Avhere, after theturning of the tables by the King's party in the Raid of Stirlingin 1571, already referred to, the unfortunate Regent Lennox wasmurdered by his fleeing captors.
